verses.text: O God, the heathen are come into thine inheritance;
The dead bodies of thy servants have they given to be meat unto the fowls of the heaven,
Their blood have they shed like water round about Jerusalem;
We are become a reproach to our neighbours,
How long, LORD ? Wilt thou be angry for ever?
Pour out thy wrath upon the heathen that have not known thee,
O remember not against us former iniquities: Let thy tender mercies speedily prevent us:
Help us, O God of our salvation, for the glory of thy name:
Let the sighing of the prisoner come before thee;
And render unto our neighbours sevenfold into their bosom
So we thy people and sheep of thy pasture will give thee thanks for ever:
